mapper.select: /* 2021.02.21 choi.hak.jun selectBoardList*/ SELECT board_id, title, writer_id, writer_name, content, view_count, like_count, code, create_by, date_format(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as create_time FROM board WHERE code = #{code} AND would_you_yn = 1 ORDER BY board_id desc LIMIT #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
